team.subheader: Meet the people who make our mission possible.

aboutUs.paragraph1: We are a group of longtime friends united not only by friendship, but also by a shared passion for technology and improving people's daily lives. We've known each other since high school and later studied together at the Slovak University of Technology in Bratislava. During years of shared study and extracurricular projects, we created a strong team that can complement and motivate each other.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our current goal is to create a practical mobile application that will help people in Slovakia easily track current discounts and promotions in supermarkets. We believe that through technology we can save time and money, while helping people better plan their shopping.

howItWorksPage.title: How It Works
howItWorksPage.subtitle: Learn how to use the main features of our app with step-by-step tutorials.

search.name: Search
search.description: Quickly find products and recipes using our powerful search engine. Filter results by category, price, or dietary preferences.

tutorials.title: How to Search for Products
tutorials.content:
1. Go to the main page and locate the search bar at the top.
2. Enter the product or recipe name you are looking for.
3. Use filters to narrow down your results.
4. Click on a result to view more details.

tutorials.title: Using Advanced Filters
tutorials.content:
1. Click on the "Filters" button next to the search bar.
2. Select categories, price ranges, or dietary tags.
3. Apply filters to update your search results.

shoppingList.name: Shopping List
shoppingList.description: Easily create and manage your shopping lists. Add items directly from search results or recipes.

tutorials.title: Creating a Shopping List
tutorials.content:
1. Navigate to the "Shopping List" section from the main menu.
2. Click "Add Item" and enter the product name.
3. Set quantity and optional notes.
4. Save your list for later use.

tutorials.title: Adding Items from Recipes
tutorials.content:
1. Open a recipe you like.
2. Click the "Add to Shopping List" button.
3. The ingredients will be added to your shopping list automatically.

profile.name: Profile
profile.description: Manage your account, preferences, and view your activity history.

tutorials.title: Updating Your Profile
tutorials.content:
1. Go to the "Profile" section from the menu.
2. Click "Edit Profile".
3. Update your personal information and preferences.
4. Save changes to update your profile.

tutorials.title: Viewing Activity History
tutorials.content:
1. In the "Profile" section, scroll down to "Activity History".
2. Review your recent searches, lists, and recipes viewed.

privacyPolicy.pageSubtitle: Learn how we handle your data to keep your experience safe and private.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: This Privacy Policy outlines how our mobile application collects, uses, and protects your information when you interact with our app. By using the app, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content: Our app may request access to certain features on your device that are necessary for its core functionality.

sections.title: 3. Camera Permission
sections.content:
We require CAMERA permission to enable key features of the app. This includes:

- Capturing photos and/or videos within the app
- Processing image data for visual-based functionality

This access is solely for the features provided within the app and is not used beyond its intended purpose.

sections.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
The camera data is used **only** within the app for functional purposes. Specifically:

- Camera data is processed locally on your device
- We do **not** collect, transmit, or store your photos or videos on our servers unless you explicitly choose to upload or share them
- Camera data is **not** used for advertising, marketing, or analytics

Your privacy is central to our app experience.

sections.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
sections.content:
- All media (photos/videos) captured within the app are stored locally on your device
- We implement reasonable security practices to help protect any in-app data processing
- We do **not** sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties

sections.title: 6. Your Choices
sections.content:
You have full control over your data:

- You can **deny or revoke** camera permissions at any time via your device settings
- You may **delete any media** captured through the app using your device's file manager

The app's functionality may be limited without camera access, but it will remain secure and respectful of your choices.

sections.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review the policy regularly for any changes.

sections.title: 8. Contact Us
sections.content:
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Email: info@usetrislovensko.sk
Website: usetrislovensko.sk

sections.title: Effective Date
sections.content: This policy is effective as of April 16, 2025.

cookiePolicy.pageSubtitle: Find out how and why we use cookies in our application.

sections.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help websites remember information about your visit, like your preferred language or login status.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to enhance your user experience, analyze app traffic, and understand how users interact with our platform. This helps us improve the performance and functionality of our services.

sections.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content:
- **Essential Cookies**: Required for the app to function properly.
- **Analytics Cookies**: Help us track usage and performance.
- **Preference Cookies**: Remember your preferences like language and layout.

sections.title: 4. Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can manage or disable cookies through your device or browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect certain features or your user experience.

sections.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: We may allow trusted third parties, such as analytics providers, to place cookies on our app to gather usage data or serve relevant ads.

sections.title: 6. Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted here, and we encourage you to review the policy periodically.

sections.title: 7. Contact Us
sections.content: For any questions regarding our use of cookies, you can reach us at info@usetrislovensko.sk.
